skills.DevelopText: I actively engage in project development using web technologies like Typescript and Node.js, while constantly delving into innovative tech to take my projects to higher realms. I've also delved into projects with embedded programming and image processing.
skills.UXDesignText: Guided by minimalism, I leverage Figma to turn ideas into intuitive and captivating interfaces. I conduct the prototyping of visual interfaces and Design Systems, guided by a deep understanding of user needs and prioritizing an intuitive, seamless experience.
skills.DesignText: My experience in graphic design revolves around crafting striking visual identities and memorable marketing materials. Mastering the key tools in Adobe Creative Cloud, my dedication transcends aesthetics: It's about conveying messages in a compelling manner.
skills.VideoEditText: As a video editor and Motion Designer, my job involves crafting an engaging visual narrative to transform concepts into visual stories. In each project, I strive for both visual and emotional excellence, aiming to create a memorable experience for the viewer.

about.AboutText: I'm Luiz, a Front-End Web developer currently studying Computer Engineering at the Federal Technological University of Paran√°. Passionate about design and technology, I invest significant time in enhancing my expertise in these areas. A music enthusiast with a love for instruments, I uncovered my creative side early when a started freelancing in graphic design, editing, and motion. I live in a constant process of improvement and actively seek new skills to become a more versatile professional.
about.ToolsText: I enjoy exploring new tools and I'm always seeking to specialize in something new. Below, you can check out some of the technologies I have already used in personal and professional projects.

projects.ProjectsText: Check out some past projects I've worked on.
